Parameter.Name: AccountID
Parameter.Description: id_acc of the account the credit note is issued for

Parameter.Name: CurrentTime
Parameter.Description: Date and time the credit note is created

Parameter.Name: CreditNoteID
Parameter.Description: The ID of the Credit Note we are generating a credit note string for.

Parameter.Name: CreditNoteString
Parameter.Description: Credit note string returned by the procedure.

Parameter.Name: Status
Parameter.Description: Status returned by the procedure. Return -1 for error, return 1 for success.

Query.Description: Procedure that creates a new credit note string based on input parameters to the procedure and logic within the procedure. If the credit note string generated is a duplicate of an existing t_be_cor_cre_creditnote.c_CreditNoteString value, then the procedure will return empty string as the credit note string.
